UX Designer at SurveyMonkey
March 23, 2015, Brady was a client of Malia’s

Brady is a force to behold. Throughout our web design project for DataStax, Brady has proven to be a true advocate of both user and business needs. He has a razor-sharp focus that is very contagious and motivating to others. His communication skills are top-notch, and his knowledge of the tech industry is of the utmost informed. In working with him as a freelancer, I have witnessed Brady's ability to have a lot of impact fast, while still maintaining his visionary state of mind, which keeps him and his marketing team moving forward. He is a wise businessperson with tremendous ideas and the critical thinking skills it takes to tackle any problem. Brady would make an excellent addition to any team.

Composer / Singer / Voice Actor / Marketer / Dad
March 12, 2015, Brady worked with Luigi in the same group

I think my favorite qualities of Brady's are his adaptability and critical thinking all in one. It's better than just having a creative "ideas" type of person. Who says. I have a great idea, now you do it. That's not Brady. He will actually go the extra mile and grab the steering wheel and test things out himself. That's true ownership and accountability. He was such a great teammate with a great attitude. He was detrimental at helping grow our Cassandra Community which was a huge part of DataStax's commercial success and growth. Along with field events, he also took it upon himself to learn scripts, web, SEO/SEM and lead generation. He has the true spirit of a Marketer. I hope I can work with Brady again in the future.

Andy Sautins
Technical Lead/Manager at Google
February 27, 2014, Brady worked with Andy but at different companies

While occupying the role of Community Manager at DataStax, I worked closely with Andy Sautins on a number of occasions to organize big data events across the Boulder/Denver Big Data Meetup Group and the Colorado Cassandra Users group. Working with Andy was a very pleasant experience; he's extremely responsive, knows his stuff about event organization/meetup groups, and values transparency + follow-through in coordination. I strongly recommend working with Andy, you won't be disappointed!

summary: I believe in being customer driven, always learning and testing, cross-functional collaboration, and taking a pragmatic approach to marketing. I enjoy deriving decisions from data, digging into the analytics, user growth strategies, A/B testing, and providing an empathetic customer experience.
